mapper.select: SELECT * FROM homework WHERE course_id = #{courseId} ORDER BY start_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO homework (course_id, title, description, start_time, end_time, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{courseId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT h.id, h.title, h.end_time AS endTime, IFNULL(hs.status, 1) AS status, hs.score FROM homework h LEFT JOIN homework_submission hs ON h.id = hs.homework_id AND hs.student_id = #{studentId} WHERE h.course_id = #{courseId} ORDER BY h.start_time DESC
SELECT COUNT(h.id) FROM homework h JOIN course_student cs ON h.course_id = cs.course_id WHERE cs.student_id = #{studentId}
